Text:
I've got to say that this made the movie much better... I'd always wondered why the HELL you would bring in Guy Pierce, only to see him in heavy makeup... Your additional scenes really did flesh it out. I saw this one in the theater and have it on disc... I think I prefer your version. 

A/10
V/10
Well thank you very much for your support, I worked hard on this to try and expand the story as much as possible :)

Well, i am looking forward to download this Ultimate Cut.
By the way, what about the alternative beggining and ending?
AR is way off - waste of bandwith
Nice attempt. There are more scenes that should have been added, like the scene where they find the worm and the alternate beginning.
